replies.msg:
Benedict Cumberbatch is confirmed to return as Stephen Strange, and Benedict Wong is also confirmed to return as Wong. Rachel McAdams ”is likely to return“ as Dr. Christine Palmer. There is no word yet on Chiwetel Ejiofor‘s Baron Mordo.


THR is reporting that production is being eyed to begin in Spring of 2020, with a possible roll out in May or 2021. Marvel, it should be noted, has yet to confirm the sequel.

https://www.syfy.com/syfywire/scott-derrickson-finalizes-deal-for-the-doctor-strange-sequel




Rachel
姐係最早2021先有得睇
